about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of Invasher
70 tracks (8-Bit + Plus tracks)
Total length 2:01:48 minutes
320 kbps MP3 + 24Bit FLAC

And give access to change BGM from 8-Bit to Plus Version in main game.

Tracks:

Disc 1
01 Title (8-Bit)
02 Main Menu (8-Bit)
03 Prologue (8-Bit)
04 Event 1 (8-Bit)
05 Event 2 (8-Bit)
06 Versus 1 (8-Bit)
07 Base (8-Bit)
